description.original: Adds backlink tags and created/modified dates to the footer of your notes.
description.translation: Adds backlink tags and created/modified dates to the footer of your notes.

dict.text: \"After each update you'll be prom: text: "After each update you'll be prompted with the release notes. You can disable this in the plugin settings."
dict.text: \"\\u{1F9B6} Rich Foot adds a foot: text: "\u{1F9B6} Rich Foot adds a footer to your notes with useful information such as backlinks, creation date, and last modified date. Use the settings below to customize the appearance."
dict.text: \"Notes in excluded folders (and t: text: "Notes in excluded folders (and their subfolders) will not display the Rich Foot footer. This is useful for system folders or areas where you don't want footer information to appear."
dict..setDesc(\"Enter a folder path or browse: .setDesc("Enter a folder path or browse to select")
dict..setDesc(\"Show creation and modificatio: .setDesc("Show creation and modification dates in the footer")
dict..setDesc(\"Specify a frontmatter propert: .setDesc("Specify a frontmatter property to use for creation date (leave empty to use file creation date)")
.setDesc("Specify a frontmatter property to use for modification date (leave empty to use file modification date)")
dict..setDesc(\"Adjust the width of the foote: .setDesc("Adjust the width of the footer border (1-10px)")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose the style of the foote: .setDesc("Choose the style of the footer border")
dict..setDesc(\"Adjust the opacity of the foo: .setDesc("Adjust the opacity of the footer border (0-1)")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose the color for the foot: .setDesc("Choose the color for the footer border")
dict..setDesc(\"Adjust the border radius of B: .setDesc("Adjust the border radius of Backlinks and Outlinks (0-15px)")
dict..setDesc(\"Adjust the opacity of Backlin: .setDesc("Adjust the opacity of Backlinks and Outlinks (0-1)")
dict..setDesc(\"Adjust the opacity of the Cre: .setDesc("Adjust the opacity of the Created / Modified Dates (0-1)")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose the color for Created: .setDesc("Choose the color for Created / Modified Dates")
dict..setDesc(\"View release notes for the cu: .setDesc("View release notes for the current version")
dict.'<h2>\\u{1F4C6} Dates Your Way</h2>\\n<h:
'

\u{1F4C6} Dates Your Way

v1.7.0

✨ Added

  • Custom Created/Modified Date Property fields to allow users to specify their own frontmatter properties for dates, useful when file system dates are affected by sync processes and you track them separately.

'
